name: Footprint Music Limited
goal: FPM is a specialist music copyright and licensing consultancy focused solely on the music and entertainment industries, offering expert advice and executive support covering all forms of linear and non-linear media, including TV and radio, film, online and mobile platforms.
interests: Communication, Competition, Culture and media, Single market
euInitiatives:

Satellite and Cable Directive

InfoSoc Directive
